scripts.dev:docEngine: concurrently "yarn dev" " cd node_modules/obojobo-document-engine && yarn dev"
scripts.lint:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && yarn lint); done
scripts.lint:css:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && yarn lint:css); done
scripts.lint:js:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && yarn lint:js); done
scripts.open:coverage:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && open ./coverage/lcov-report/index.html); done
scripts.precommit:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && yarn precommit); done
scripts.setup: yarn build --mode=production && cd node_modules/obojobo-express && yarn db:rebuild
scripts.test:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && yarn test); done
scripts.test:ci:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && TZ='America/New_York' CI=true jest --ci --useStderr --coverage --coverageReporters text-summary cobertura); done
scripts.test:coverage:
for d in ./packages/*/* ; do (cd "$d" && echo "
==================" && basename "$d" && yarn test -u --coverage); done
